column2:
"All troops have retreated.
Lady Harriet, you should too."

"I can't, there's something left
I must do."

"M'lady...? Surely
you don't mean..."

"Incarnation come forth,
Buster of Mystery...!"

"M'lady Harriet, it's just not
possible! You know there's no one
that can control the Buster Towers!"

"Even so, I must do this! This is the
only way to break the Devil Barriers
surrounding the Devil Castle!"

"Please.... hear my prayers...
Rid this world of everlasting
darkness!"

"!! Is this a sign that
I'm not worthy..."
"Whew, just in time!"

"<%me>...
Why are you here...?"
"1. I can't leave you by yourself"
"2. You looked afraid"

"<%me>'s right.
There's no way we would leave
you alone given the current situation!"

"You're mistaken if you think you
can do this alone!"

"We, ARKS, no wait...
Guardians, cannot let this slide!"
"Guard--ian..."
"You have my gratitude."

"Now now, it's a bit too early too
start thanking us. "

"Even for a Guardian, we can't keep
attacking enemies, who spawn
indefinitely."

"While Harriet's forces are scattered
throughout and attacking the enemy..."

"We need to break through that
barrier and defeat that strange
castle that suddenly appeared!"

"But that barrier is going to need
countless amount of effort to
destroy it... Can we handle it?"
"1. I've got this!"
"2. We'll manage"
"What!? The Buster Tower...!"
"What's the matter, Harriet?"

"There might be a way to
break the barrier..."

"Allow me to trust in your power,
Guardians."
